item.title: Installing TrueCrypt on Fedora 9 HOWTO
item.description: On the 4th of July, the TrueCrypt team released version 6.0 of its amazing product. I am generally quite excited by new software releases and can’t wait to try them out as soon as possible. From the web-site, some of the new features in the TrueCrypt version 6.0 are: Parallelized encryption/decryption on multi-core processors (or multi-processor systems). Increase in encryption/decryption speed is directly proportional to the number of cores and/or processors.
